513.accept_chat_bubble: You will need the Ninja Hood to pass the Fallen Gate.
513.chat_state_1: Your final test awaits you. Are you ready?
513.chat_state_2: It will take great strength and cunning to face down a Dragon! Take a friend if you must!
513.chat_state_3: I smell bitter smoke and salty ash. Did someone burn popcorn again?
513.chat_state_4: I once faced a Dragon, but then I faced the other way. Kii-yaa!!
513.in_progress: Follow the Path of the Dragon to the Fallen Gate and defeat a Maelstrom Dragon on the far side. Work with your friends if need be.
513.offer: So you have passed the Ninjas' tests. Now for mine: defeat a Dragon! Kii-yaa!!
513.ready_to_complete: Not a scorch on you! Take this Dragon Tooth as a symbol of your strength and bravery! Kii-yaa!!

516.accept_chat_bubble: The Stromlings carry the Maelstrom infection - and the infected bricks contain clues.
516.chat_state_1: The Maelstrom makes my head spin!
516.chat_state_2: The mystery of the Maelstrom is deep indeed.
516.chat_state_3: Have you been studying the Maelstrom?
516.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
516.in_progress: Talk to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
516.offer: I can learn nothing further. Go to Echs Ray at the Refinery in Forbidden Valley. His insight may be greater than mine.
516.ready_to_complete: The Maelstrom seems like chaos at first, but look deeper and a <font color='#FF7F00'>pattern</font> begins to emerge!

541.chat_state_2: You'll find the device on the other side of the Maelstrom Trench.
541.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Renee Tombcrusher in Gnarled Forest.
541.in_progress: Quick Build the Siren Stunner near the Maelstrom Trench to stun the Stromling Pirates.
541.offer: The Venture League sent some equipment to help the Pirates. Quick Build that device nearby!
541.ready_to_complete: Not bad! You're pretty handy with those things!

588.accept_chat_bubble: Which Specialty Kit will you choose?
588.chat_state_2: Meldric Steamvalve runs the Assembly Faction Shop in the Plaza.
588.chat_state_3_turnin: Build up your powers with Assembly Faction gear!
588.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Meldric Steamvalve in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
588.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Meldric Steamvalve</font> in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
588.offer: You've got another important choice to make. <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Meldric Steamvalve</font>, the Assembly Vendor, to pick your first Specialty Kit!
588.ready_to_complete: Welcome to Assembly, builder! <font color='#FF7F00'>Pick your first Specialty Kit</font>!

589.accept_chat_bubble: Which Specialty Kit will you choose?
589.chat_state_2: Magnus Bumperdent runs the Venture League Faction Shop in the Plaza.
589.chat_state_3_turnin: Chase down adventures in Venture League Faction gear!
589.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Magnus Bumperdent in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
589.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Magnus Bumperdent</font> in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
589.offer: You've got another important choice to make. <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Magnus Bumperdent</font>, the Venture League Vendor, to pick your first Specialty Kit!
589.ready_to_complete: Ready to explore with Venture League? <font color='#FF7F00'>Pick your first Specialty Kit</font>!

590.accept_chat_bubble: Which Specialty Kit will you choose?
590.chat_state_2: Cog Blammo runs the Paradox Faction Shop in the Plaza.
590.chat_state_3_turnin: Unleash your dark side with Paradox Faction gear!
590.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Cog Blammo in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
590.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Cog Blammo</font> in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
590.offer: You've got another important choice to make. <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Cog Blammo</font>, the Paradox Vendor, to pick your first Specialty Kit!
590.ready_to_complete: Paradox peers into the Maelstrom. Are you ready? <font color='#FF7F00'>Choose your first Specialty Kit</font>!

591.accept_chat_bubble: Which Specialty Kit will you choose?
591.chat_state_2: Xeno Blueblade runs the Sentinel Faction Shop in the Plaza.
591.chat_state_3_turnin: Show your strength in Sentinel Faction Gear!
591.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Xeno Blueblade in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
591.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Xeno Blueblade</font> in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!
591.offer: You've got another important choice to make. <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Xeno Blueblade</font>, the Sentinel Faction Vendor, to pick your first Specialty Kit!
591.ready_to_complete: Strong choice, Minifigure! <font color='#FF7F00'>Pick your first Specialty Kit</font>!

592.description: Quick Build all 4 instruments at the Red Blocks concert 10 more times each.

593.description: Discover all 4 points of interest in Nimbus Station.

594.accept_chat_bubble: Follow the Path of the Skeletal Steed to Cavalry Hill.
594.chat_state_1: It is not enough to smash and destroy. One must also learn to build and create.
594.chat_state_2: Stop the Horsemen from escaping their crypts by building Maelstrom Turrets!
594.chat_state_3: Pandas see the world in black and white.
594.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Brickmaster Clang in Forbidden Valley.
594.in_progress: Smash the statues above the crypts on Cavalry Hill in Forbidden Valley, then rebuild them into turrets.
594.offer: To build is to battle! Take the Path of the Skeletal Steed to Cavalry Hill, then build Maelstrom Turrets to block the crypts!
594.ready_to_complete: You are a worthy builder. Tell Master Fong I approve.

595.description: Dance with 3 different fans at the Red Blocks concert.

597.description: Spin the skeleton in the cage 25 times.

598.description: Quick Build all 4 of the Red Blocks concert effects into the same type at the same time.

602.description: Play each of the Red Blocks concert instruments for at least 30 seconds.

616.description: Collect Flags in Avant Gardens, Nimbus Station, Gnarled Forest, and Forbidden Valley.

618.description: Complete 50 more Missions, for a total of 100.

620.description: Complete 50 more Achievements, for a total of 100.

621.description: Complete 100 more Achievements, for a total of 200.

622.accept_chat_bubble: The Racing Vendor is over there to my left.
622.chat_state_1: Welcome to Vertigo Loop - Nimbus Station's amazing space race!
622.chat_state_2: You can't race without a Race Car, and first you need a chassis!
622.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place to get your first Race Car package!
622.in_progress: Buy a Car Chassis from Ludwig Clutchburn at the Nimbus Station Race Place.
622.offer: Think you're racing material? Start by purchasing a Car Chassis from the Racing Vendor!
622.ready_to_complete: Great! Here are the parts for your first Race Car! Pick a package!

623.accept_chat_bubble: The Build Area is that gray platform to my right.
623.chat_state_1: Ready to build your first car?
623.chat_state_2: No pedestrians on the race track! Which means you'll need a race car first.
623.chat_state_3: Don't you just love that new car smell?
623.completion_succeed_tip: You've built your first car! Tell Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place.
623.in_progress: Interact with the car hologram on the Build Area to build a car.
623.offer: Now that you have the parts, you can build your first car! Click on the Build Area right there.
623.ready_to_complete: Sweet ride! Buy more car modules from vendors, or score them from races and Achievements!

624.accept_chat_bubble: Get ready for a wild ride - and watch out for asteroids!
624.chat_state_1: Who's ready to get their race on?
624.chat_state_2: Aren't you supposed to be racing right now?
624.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place.
624.in_progress: Drag a car model from your Backpack to the Race Activator to start the event.
624.offer: Ready to tear it up on the track? Drag your car onto the Race Activator to start your first race!
624.ready_to_complete: Great job out there! I think you're ready to compete for real!

625.chat_state_1: Did you know your car uses Imagination too?
625.chat_state_2: The Imagination's on the track, not out here!
625.chat_state_3: Did you use your Imagination out there?
625.completion_succeed_tip: You've mastered Boost and Imagination during races. Tell Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place.
625.in_progress: Collect 9 Imagination Orbs during a race, then press spacebar to Boost.
625.offer: Imagination lets your car Boost! Collect 9 Imagination orbs during the next race!
625.ready_to_complete: That should Boost your lap times! You can even get more Boost from Imagination Crates!

626.chat_state_1: Trying to get in front is fun - trying to stay in front is better!
626.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place.
626.in_progress: Finish in 3rd place or better during a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.
626.offer: Okay, you ready for the Winners' Circle? Try to place in the top 3!
626.ready_to_complete: View's always better when you're in the front, huh?

627.accept_chat_bubble: Drive a clean line and boost boost boost!
627.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place.
627.in_progress: Beat Velocity Lane's lap time of 1:10 during a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.
627.offer: So you think you're fast, huh? Fast enough to beat my best lap time of 1:10?
627.ready_to_complete: Whoa, you did it! Guess I better get some practice laps in!

628.chat_state_1: Racing isn't just about driving fast - it's about winning!
628.completion_succeed_tip: You won a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack! See Velocity Lane for a reward.
628.in_progress: Win a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.
628.offer: Only one thing left to do - and that's win a race!
628.ready_to_complete: Congrats, champ! I think you're ready to step it up!

629.accept_chat_bubble: Find the Gnarled Forest launch pad and blast off!
629.chat_state_1: Spaceships are one thing - but how about pirate ships?
629.chat_state_2: If you can't find the Race Place in Gnarled Forest, talk to Captain Jack first.
629.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.
629.in_progress: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.
629.offer: Ready to race at Gnarled Forest? Go see Swifty McGurk at the Race Place there.
629.ready_to_complete: Yeah, and whaddya you want, matey?

630.chat_state_1: You ain't quite ready to learn what I gots to teach, young sprog!
630.chat_state_2: If the flotsam don't get ya, the jetsam will!
630.chat_state_3: Only a few bumps n' scratches, eh?
630.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.
630.in_progress: Complete a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack without wrecking.
630.offer: This here's a tough track, lotsa debris out there. Finish a race without becoming a wreck yerself!
630.ready_to_complete: Back in one piece, eh? Guess you're learnin' the track a bit.

631.accept_chat_bubble: Remember, get 3rd place or don't show yer face!
631.chat_state_1: I learned to drive 'cause I ain't learned to swim, ya believe that?
631.chat_state_3: I hope yeh done good out there if yer botherin' me again.
631.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.
631.in_progress: Finish in 3rd place or better during a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.
631.offer: No time to waste here! Come back with 3rd place or better - or don't come back at all!
631.ready_to_complete: Arrrrr!! Done that handsomely now! Let's see what swag yer gettin'!

632.chat_state_1: Drivin' a car's a lot like drivin' a boat. Except for them wheels.
632.chat_state_2: I don't think yer gonna do it!
632.chat_state_3: No way yeh beat my time, not with that heap.
632.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.
632.in_progress: Beat Swifty McGurk's best lap time of 1:40 during a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.
632.offer: Now let's see what that jollyboat o' yers can do! Can yeh beat my fastest lap time of 1:40?
632.ready_to_complete: Sink me, that was quicker 'n twenty lashes with ten greased eels!

633.accept_chat_bubble: There's tons of Maelstrom down the road, so be careful!
633.chat_state_1: I'm stayin' up here where it's safe!
633.chat_state_2: Get to Crash Helmut. He’ll be able to help.
633.chat_state_3_turnin: What are you doing here? This place is dangerous!
633.chat_state_4_turnin: I don't know how that creature got out there, but we gotta clear her off!
633.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Crash Helmut in the infected Launch Area in Avant Gardens.
633.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Crash Helmut</font> at the infected Launch Area in Avant Gardens.
633.offer: Some Maelstrom creature has invaded the Block Yard Property! <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Crash Helmut</font> down the road and find out how you can help!
633.ready_to_complete: A massive Maelstrom Spider has taken control of the Block Yard Property and she’s creating this horrible Maelstrom fog!

635.accept_chat_bubble: And just so you know, I got that time without even wearin' pants!
635.chat_state_1: Yesterday I seen a Mermaid yellin' at a bunch of Stromlings. Very strange.
635.chat_state_2: Ya ain't beat my time yet, did yeh?
635.chat_state_3: Yeh beat me, didn't you? I'm startin' to feel like a seasick cabin boy.
635.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.
635.in_progress: Beat Swifty McGurk's best race time of 5:00 during a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.
635.offer: Alright, barracuda shorts - let's make terms. Three laps. One race. And yeh beat this:  5:00.
635.ready_to_complete: What am I still doin' here? You should be trainin' all these racin' swabs, not me!

636.accept_chat_bubble: Yeh ain't no second-place finisher, are yeh? So prove it!
636.chat_state_1: I won my first race before I even learned to drive. Honest truth!
636.chat_state_2: You got any first-place loot in yer pockets? Or just sea urchins an' belly-button lint?
636.chat_state_3: Yeh don't smell like no exhaust, that's a good sign.
636.completion_succeed_tip: You won a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack! See Swifty McGurk in Gnarled Forest for a reward.
636.in_progress: Win a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.
636.offer: Yeh ain't worth yer salt 'til you score some real first-place loot!
636.ready_to_complete: Blimey, yeh did it! Some more trinkets for the chest, eh?

637.accept_chat_bubble: Do I look like a cheeky lass with a fancy hairdo and pretty eyes? No!
637.chat_state_1: I always wanted to race at Vertigo Loop - but I'm a-scared o' asteroids!
637.chat_state_2: Jump on yer fancy rocket and head back to Nimbus Station. Then talk to Velocity Lane again.
637.completion_succeed_tip: Speak to Velocity Lane at Nimbus Station Race Place.
637.in_progress: Speak to Velocity Lane at the Nimbus Station Race Place.
637.offer: One last challenge! Go and talk to that Velocity lass at the Vertigo Loop racetrack!
637.ready_to_complete: Back from Gnarled Forest? And with a few wins under your belt, I hope.

638.description: Place in the top 3 at the Vertigo Loop racetrack. Minimum of 3 players in the race.

639.description: Win a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack. Minimum of 3 players in the race.

640.description: Place in the top 3 at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack. Minimum of 3 players in the race.

641.description: Win a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack. Minimum of 3 players in the race.

642.description: Achieve a 1:05 lap time or better at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.

643.description: Achieve a 3:10 total time or better at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.

644.description: Achieve a 1:30 lap time or better at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.

645.description: Achieve a 4:45 total time or better at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.

646.description: Complete a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack without wrecking.

647.description: Complete a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack without wrecking.

651.description: Smash 100 smashables in any number of races.

652.description: Smash 250 more Smashables in any number of races.

653.description: Smash 500 more Smashables in any number of races.

654.description: Collect 100 Imagination orbs in any number of races.

655.description: Collect 500 more Imagination orbs in any number of races.

656.description: Collect 1000 more Imagination orbs in any number of races.

658.description: Compete in 25 more races, for a total of 50.

659.description: Compete in 50 more races, for a total of 100.

660.accept_chat_bubble: Build a bouncer to reach Sky Lane.
660.chat_state_1: We've got to get you out of here!
660.chat_state_2: Sky Lane can teach you how to build a rocket!
660.chat_state_3_turnin: Good, you made it! Interact with me so we can talk!
660.chat_state_4: Talk to Sky Lane! She can help you escape!
660.completion_succeed_tip: Quick Build a bouncer and use it to reach Sky Lane.
660.in_progress: Quick Builds require Imagination. <font color='#FF7F00'>Quick Build a Bouncer</font> and use it to <font color='#FF7F00'>talk to Sky Lane</font>.
660.offer: Use your Imagination to reach <font color='#FF7F00'>Sky Lane</font>. She will help you build a rocket!
660.ready_to_complete: Nice work. Smash items to find glowing blue power-ups when you run low on Imagination.

661.description: Win any 5 races. Minimum of 3 players per race.

662.description: Win any 10 races. Minimum of 3 players per race.

663.description: Win any 20 races. Minimum of 3 players per race.

664.description: Complete Bob's Mission to unlock your Imagination.

665.description: Win 10 races at the Vertigo Loop racetrack. Minimum of 3 players per race.

666.description: Win 10 races at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack. Minimum of 3 players per race.

667.description: Finish in last place in any 10 races.

668.accept_chat_bubble: You've won races before, just do it again and you'll take the Series!
668.chat_state_1: You ready to really go for it?
668.chat_state_2: Doesn't matter what order you do your races in - just win 'em both.
668.chat_state_3: I heard about your big wins! Awesome!
668.chat_state_4: Keep racing, building cars and earning Achievements! More racing is on the way soon!
668.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Velocity Lane in Nimbus Station.
668.in_progress: Win 1 race each at the Vertigo Loop and Keelhaul Canyon racetracks.
668.offer: Ready for your first Race Series? Win 1 race each at Vertigo Loop and Keelhaul Canyon! Minimum of 3 players per race.
668.ready_to_complete: Congratulations, champ! More challenges are coming down the track!

669.description: Swap out every module on your car during a Car Build session.

673.description: Complete all 7 Vertigo Loop Racing Achievements.

674.description: Complete all 7 Keelhaul Canyon Racing Achievements.

676.description: Complete 10 more Racing Achievements, for a total of 20.

677.description: Complete 10 more Racing Achievements, for a total of 30.

678.description: Complete 6 more Racing Achievements, for a total of 36.

680.description: Complete 10 more Missions or Achievements in Avant Gardens, for a total of 40.

681.description: Tame the Terrier, Bunny, and Cat Pets.

683.description: Tame the Crab, Elephant, and Crocodile Pets.

684.description: Discover Nimbus Plaza in Nimbus Station.

685.description: Discover Red Blocks in Nimbus Station.

686.description: Discover Brick Annex in Nimbus Station.

687.description: Discover Race Place in Nimbus Station.

688.accept_chat_bubble: Pets want to be found, you just have to look everywhere!
688.chat_state_1: Lions make such great Pets - the best!
688.chat_state_2: Still hunting for Pets? Don't give up!
688.chat_state_3: I sense a lot of happy animals!
688.chat_state_4: Show off your Pets and let everyone see how much fun they are!
688.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Coalessa in Pet Cove.
688.in_progress: Tame 18 different Pets, then return to Coalessa.
688.offer: Nancy says if you can tame 18 different pets, you can tame a Lion too!
688.ready_to_complete: You are truly a friend to all animals! Somewhere, there is a Lion you can tame. Find it!

689.accept_chat_bubble: Smash the anvil and make your way to Numb Chuck.
689.chat_state_1: Great view, isn't it? On clear days, you can see even more fog.
689.chat_state_2: An anvil is nothing without a Hammer to smash it.
689.completion_succeed_tip: Smash the anvil and find a way up to Numb Chuck.
689.in_progress: Use the Maelstrom Hammer to smash the anvil in the Great Tree. Then find a way to reach Numb Chuck.
689.offer: You are now ready to speak to Numb Chuck, our most learned Ninja. He resides in the highest branches of our Tree.
689.ready_to_complete: Is it just dumb luck that you have found Numb Chuck? Kii-yaa!!

695.description: Use all 10 of the Binoculars in Forbidden Valley.

696.accept_chat_bubble: Smash objects to find the bricks I need, or visit a Brick Vendor.
696.chat_state_1: Those dirty, cowardly Pirates! Who do they think they arrrrr?
696.chat_state_2: If you can get me the bricks, we can bust our Ninja brothers out of jail!
696.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Gathermaster Klex in Forbidden Valley.
696.in_progress: Find 16 of these bricks and take them to Gathermaster Klex.
696.offer: Some fellow Ninjas were captured by Pirates in Gnarled Forest! We have a plan - but we need 16 of these bricks first.
696.ready_to_complete: Excellent! Here are dummies to use for a jailbreak switcheroo! Clang knows what to do next.

697.accept_chat_bubble: You can buy Blue Imaginite from some vendors.
697.chat_state_2: I'll bet someone nearby is selling Blue Imaginite.
697.chat_state_4: Bring me more Blue Imaginite and I'll open more Backpack space for you!

697.offer: Bring me 1 Blue Imaginite and I will add one slot for Items in your Backpack!
697.ready_to_complete: Here, just a minute while I adjust your Backpack.

701.accept_chat_bubble: That dummy may work as a decoy, if you can find a head.
701.chat_state_2: That dummy may work as a decoy, if you can find a head.
701.chat_state_3: Yes, that should work. Hurry and smash the door!
701.completion_succeed_tip: The dummy is now complete. Smash the jail cell door with the Maelstrom Hammer.
701.in_progress: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Hashi from the jail in Gnarled Forest.
701.ready_to_complete: If we place the dummy in here the Pirates will never know the difference.

702.accept_chat_bubble: A headless dummy will fool no one. Even a Pirate.
702.chat_state_2: A headless dummy will fool no one. Even a Pirate.
702.chat_state_3: Perfect. Break open the door so I can make my escape?
702.completion_succeed_tip: The dummy is now complete. Smash the jail cell door with the Maelstrom Hammer.
702.in_progress: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Mashi from the jail in Gnarled Forest.
702.offer: I do not care for this place! It is cold and it smells like monkeys.
702.ready_to_complete: Hey, that dummy looks just like me. Put it in the cell, the Pirates will think it's me.

703.accept_chat_bubble: I hope you have a plan.
703.chat_state_2: I hope you have a plan.
703.chat_state_3: You know how to use that Hammer, right?
703.completion_succeed_tip: The dummy is now complete. Smash the jail cell door with the Maelstrom Hammer.
703.in_progress: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Steve from the jail in Gnarled Forest.
703.offer: Dude, this place is lame. You gonna get me out or what?
703.ready_to_complete: What is that? That's supposed to be me? Oh whatever, let me have it.

704.accept_chat_bubble: We must use a decoy in my place.
704.chat_state_2: I cannot just disappear, or our captors will find out.
704.chat_state_3: Yes, that dummy will work. I will stand back while you destroy the door.
704.completion_succeed_tip: The dummy is now complete. Smash the jail cell door with the Maelstrom Hammer.
704.in_progress: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Zashi from the jail in Gnarled Forest.
704.offer: Have you come from Forbidden Valley? You must set me free!
704.ready_to_complete: Forbidden Valley, here I come! I hope you enjoy jail, noble dummy decoy!

705.accept_chat_bubble: Head to Gnarled Forest to put our plan into action!
705.chat_state_2: Go to Gnarled Forest and free our Ninja brothers!
705.chat_state_3: Hashi, Mashi and Zashi returned safely, thanks to you. Steve probably got lost.
705.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Brickmaster Clang in Forbidden Valley.
705.in_progress: Use your Hammer to smash the bars and talk to the imprisoned Ninjas in Gnarled Forest.
705.offer: Go to Gnarled Forest and free the 4 Ninjas in the Jails. You'll need your Maelstrom Hammer!
705.ready_to_complete: It worked! Those Pirates will fall for anything.

706.completion_succeed_tip: You've discovered the Paradox Research Facility!
706.description: Discover the Paradox Research Facility in Avant Gardens.

707.completion_succeed_tip: You've discovered the Sentinel Base Camp!
707.description: Discover the Sentinel Faction Base Camp in Avant Gardens.

708.description: Discover the Monument in Avant Gardens.

709.description: Discover the Launch Area in Avant Gardens.

733.accept_chat_bubble: If you need more coins to buy Armor Polish, just get back out there and smash more Stromlings!
733.chat_state_1: It isn't a battle if you don't get dirty!
733.chat_state_2: Good old Klaus sells a lot of useful things, but right now I need some Armor Polish.
733.chat_state_3: The best offense is a strong defense! And you might as well make it shiny while you're at it!
733.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Beck Strongheart with the Armor Polish.
733.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Buy 3 cans of Armor Polish</font> from Klaus Zett, the Gear Vendor, and return to Beck Strongheart.
733.offer: It’s time you learned about armor. <font color='#FF7F00'>Buy 3 cans of Armor Polish</font> from the Gear Vendor over there!
733.ready_to_complete: <font color='#FF7F00'>Double-click</font> your Armor Polish to <font color='#FF7F00'>repair your Armor</font>. Oh, and here’s a helmet with armor for you to try out.

734.accept_chat_bubble: I've done all I can here. The rest is up to Master Fong and the Paradox leaders.
734.chat_state_1: What was that old saying? Stare into the abyss, and -
734.chat_state_2: Hurry, get out of here! This information cannot wait! You must take it to Master Fong!
734.chat_state_3: I am glad to see you return, but I fear the news you bring me.
734.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Master Fong Shader in the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.
734.in_progress: Return to Master Fong Shader in the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.
734.offer: I’ve analyzed the Maelstrom data from Wisp and well, it’s not good. Take the results back to Master Fong Shader.
734.ready_to_complete: Chaos has a name! Baron Typhonus is inside the Maelstrom - and he's controlling it! I must warn my superiors.

735.chat_state_1: That bearded wretch and his fowl foul!
735.chat_state_2: Travel to the Pirate Camp in Gnarled Forest and retrieve our treasure!
735.chat_state_3: You got it? Lemme see that baby!
735.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Numb Chuck in the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.
735.in_progress: Use your Ninja Hood to sneak past the parrots in the Pirates' Camp and recover Numb Chuck's treasure.
735.offer: That scoundrel Jack Knife stole a treasure from our Dojo and guards it with fiendish birds. Go and get it back! Kii-yaa!
735.ready_to_complete: Kii-yaa!! Not a scratch on it! You took such good care of it so here, take it!

736.accept_chat_bubble: Seek Wisp Lee in Avant Gardens.
736.chat_state_1: Chaos is without form or reason. There is something in the Maelstrom that suggests otherwise.
736.chat_state_2: The Maelstrom is powerful. Be careful.
736.chat_state_3: Are you with the Ninja? Snuck up on me there!
736.chat_state_3_turnin: If you devote yourself to an ideal, they can't stop you.
736.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Wisp Lee in Avant Gardens.
736.in_progress: Talk to Wisp Lee in Avant Gardens.
736.offer: Wisp Lee has been studying the Maelstrom in Avant Gardens. See what he has learned.
736.ready_to_complete: Master Fong sent you? I haven’t decoded the riddle of the Maelstrom yet. I see only chaos!

737.chat_state_1: Ninja guard. Doesn't make sense. Aren't Ninjas supposed to hide?
737.chat_state_2: Just stand in front of the guards and roar at them.
737.chat_state_4: I hope they don't ever have to face anything really dangerous!
737.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Ninja Tashi in Forbidden Valley.
737.in_progress: Get the Roar emote from Numb Chuck and use it to scare the guards in Forbidden Valley.
737.offer: Those guards are so serious. Want to have a roaring good time? Try different Speedchat messages and see if you can scare them!

738.accept_chat_bubble: Don't worry, he won't shoot you.
738.chat_state_1: This refinery will be safe so long as Brick Fury is around!
738.chat_state_2: Go down the hill and get 3 Horsemen to chase you back towards Brick Fury - he'll handle the rest.
738.chat_state_3: I never get tired of watching that guy do his job.
738.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Vapor Overcast by the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
738.in_progress: Lure 3 Maelstrom Horsemen up the hill and towards Brick Fury in Forbidden Valley.
738.offer: Brick Fury’s our top-of-the-line Paradox Super Soldier. Want to see him in action? Lure 3 Maelstrom Horsemen into his range!
738.ready_to_complete: Way to put yourself in the line of fire! Don't worry, Brick wouldn't have hit you - he never misses a shot.

739.accept_chat_bubble: Smashing Ronin and Horsemen will usually get you Maelstrom-infected bricks.
739.chat_state_1: Brick, you okay on power down there? Your hit rate dropped .01%!
739.chat_state_2: It's my job to keep Brick at peak performance!
739.chat_state_3: Just in time! Brick hates taking a break. That guy is a machine!
739.chat_state_4: Some say that Brick is 100% die-cast metal. Nah. But 100% awesome? Oh yeah.
739.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Vapor Overcast by the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
739.in_progress: Collect 30 Maelstrom-infected bricks and take them to Vapor Overcast at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
739.offer: Brick Fury's got more ammo than all of the Sentinels, but sometimes he runs low on power. Can you bring us 30 Maelstrom-infected bricks?
739.offer_repeatable: Brick Fury already burned through all the ammo you brought! Can you bring us 30 more Maelstrom-infected bricks?
739.ready_to_complete: Oh yeah, we are back in action! Hey Brick, I got you some more of those num-nums you like!

740.accept_chat_bubble: I hope this works, I'm sick o' watchin' these Ninjas run about!
740.chat_state_2: You think they make Ninja pajamas in my size?
740.chat_state_3: Goodbye pirate rags, I won't miss yer smell!
740.chat_state_4: Alright then, look away now. Unless you want an eyeful!
740.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Georgie Timbershivers in Forbidden Valley.
740.in_progress: Find some Pirate-Sized Ninja Clothes for Georgie Timbershivers in Forbidden Valley.
740.offer: Them sneaky Ninjas are everywhere! I need a disguise if I'm gonna get outta here! Like some o' them Ninja pajamas!
740.ready_to_complete: Can't believe I'm gonna look like one o' them Ninja, but thanks. Here, take this map piece to Cap'n Jack.

741.accept_chat_bubble: Make sure them clothes say Pirate-Sized on 'em! I ain't no wee Ninja!
741.chat_state_1: Which way to Gnarled Forest? Curse this fog!
741.chat_state_2: I know I'm a hefty lad, but they gotta have some Ninja Clothes in my size.
741.chat_state_3: You know, those actually look quite fetching.
741.chat_state_4: You can go now, don't need you seein' my fish-white belly now!
741.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Gary Grogowitz in Forbidden Valley.
741.in_progress: Find some Pirate-Sized Ninja Clothes for Gary Grogowitz in Forbidden Valley.
741.offer: You gotta help me sneak out of here without them Ninjas seein' me! Can you find a Ninja suit that'll fit me?
741.ready_to_complete: These actually look quite comfy! I'll be sneakin' out in style! As thanks, here's a scrap o' map for yeh.

742.accept_chat_bubble: Hurry up, if them Ninjas catch me I'm done for!
742.chat_state_1: Lost in Ninja-land! I ain't man enough to fight 'em, neither!
742.chat_state_2: I need some Ninja Clothes if I'm gonna get home! Find some fit for a pirate!
742.chat_state_3: Pure silk pajamas, eh? I knew them Ninjas were soft.
742.chat_state_4: Okay, off with yeh. Changin' clothes is private business, you know?
742.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Robbie Jibhanger in Forbidden Valley.
742.in_progress: Find some Pirate-Sized Ninja Clothes for Robbie Jibhanger in Forbidden Valley.
742.offer: I'm marooned in Ninja country and I can't get out! Find me a Ninja costume so I can get back to Gnarled Forest!
742.ready_to_complete: Hope no one sees me in this, I'll be keelhauled for sure! But they'll keep me safe. Have some map, swabbie!

745.accept_chat_bubble: Look all over Forbidden Valley, them coward Pirates are probably hidin' good.
745.chat_state_1: That map woulda been safer in my stinky boot!
745.chat_state_2: Them scurvy dogs better not've lost the map to them Ninjas.
745.chat_state_3: Knew you'd finish the job, matey!
745.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Captain Jack Knife at the Pirates' Camp in Gnarled Forest.
745.in_progress: Find the 3 missing Pirates in Forbidden Valley and recover the pieces of Captain Jack Knife's map.
745.offer: I split my map into 3 pieces and gave ‘em to my men for safekeepin’, but they went an’ got lost in Forbidden Valley! Can you go and find ‘em?
745.ready_to_complete: This piece goes here, that piece goes there, X marks the spot! And there's my treasure!

746.accept_chat_bubble: Treasure's in a golden chest, deep in the ground.
746.chat_state_2: You'll need some kinda Pet if yer gonna find that there treasure!
746.chat_state_3: Anyone seen you diggin' this here up?
746.completion_succeed_tip: Take the treasure back to Captain Jack Knife at the Pirates' Camp in Gnarled Forest.
746.in_progress: Find Captain Jack Knife's missing treasure in Avant Gardens.
746.offer: Forgot I buried my treasure in Avant Gardens. You can go dig it up if you’ve got a Pet with ya!
746.ready_to_complete: There she is! She taught me everything I know. I just love me Ma!

747.description: Discover the Perilous Path in Forbidden Valley.

749.description: Discover the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.

753.description: Discover the Dragon's Den in Forbidden Valley.

754.description: Discover all 7 points of interest in Forbidden Valley.

755.accept_chat_bubble: Find the weapon in your Backpack.
755.chat_state_1: Want to learn how to use that weapon?
755.chat_state_2: If you accidentally delete the weapon, buy a new one from the vendor beyond the bus.
755.chat_state_3: Did you notice the new skill that appeared on your Action Bar?
755.chat_state_4: Have you learned how to equip items and use skills?
755.in_progress: Open your <font color='#FF7F00'>Backpack</font> and <font color='#FF7F00'>equip your weapon</font>. Then <font color='#FF7F00'>attack</font> with it. To equip, click and drag the weapon onto yourself.
755.offer: Let's see what you've got, rookie. Open your <font color='#FF7F00'>Backpack</font>, click and drag the <font color='#FF7F00'>weapon</font> onto yourself to equip it, and then get smashin'!
755.ready_to_complete: Did you notice that the weapon added a <font color='#FF7F00'>skill</font> to your <font color='#FF7F00'>Action Bar</font>? Your attacks use the currently highlighted skill.

756.description: Roll a 6 on the LEGO die 100 times.

757.description: Read all of the Story Plaques in the Venture Explorer spaceship.

758.description: Read all of the Story Plaques in Avant Gardens.

759.description: Read all of the Story Plaques in Nimbus Station.

760.description: Read all of the Story Plaques in Gnarled Forest.

761.description: Read all of the Story Plaques in Forbidden Valley.

762.description: Read both of the Story Plaques in Pet Cove.

763.accept_chat_bubble: Got your hood, I hope. I took mine off because it gives me hood-hair.
763.chat_state_1: I can't even sneak through that gate! I'm a horrible ninja!
763.chat_state_2: If Numb Chuck has given you the Ninja Hood, you can pass through the gate. And don't lose it!
763.chat_state_3: Stand clear! Paradox hero at work! This is a live fire zone!
763.chat_state_3_turnin: Have you found a Maelstrom-Infused Ninja Hood?
763.completion_succeed_tip: Deliver the scroll to Vapor Overcast by the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
763.in_progress: Deliver the scroll to Vapor Overcast by the Paradox Refinery. Equip a Ninja Hood to sneak through the Fallen Gate.
763.offer: How am I going to get through that gate? I lost my Ninja Hood and I need to take this scroll to Vapor Overcast. Can you help?
763.ready_to_complete: Hey, I've been waiting for this. What happened to Bill? He lost his hood again, didn't he?

764.accept_chat_bubble: Remember, you gotta smash the statues before the Dark Ronin appear!
764.chat_state_1: Statues everywhere! Who decorated this place?
764.chat_state_2: You gotta bring the thunder before you see the lightning!
764.chat_state_3: Those statues never knew what hit 'em! 'Course, they are statues and all.
764.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Bill Shido by the Fallen Gate in Forbidden Valley.
764.in_progress: Smash 20 statues in Forbidden Valley before the Dark Ronin appear.
764.offer: All those Dark Ronin make it really hard to get through here. Bet you can't smash 20 of the statues before the Ronin appear!
764.offer_repeatable: It's a bit safer here but there's still more statues to smash!
764.ready_to_complete: Whoa, you got 'em all! Man, you're fast. And powerful. In fact, I think I'm a little afraid of you now.

767.accept_chat_bubble: Look for the Sentinel Logo above the vendor huts.
767.chat_state_2: Smash things to find Faction Tokens!
767.chat_state_3: Did you get it? All this talking isn't easy, you know?
767.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Sentinel Super Soda back to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.
767.in_progress: Use Faction Tokens to buy a Sentinel Super Soda from your Faction Vendor, then take the Soda back to Nexus Jay.
767.offer: You can now collect Faction tokens when you smash things! Can you get me a Sentinel Super Soda from your Faction Vendor?
767.ready_to_complete: Ahh, much better. Use Faction Supplies to replenish your Life, Armor, and Imagination!
